comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: The 20-room Lower Cliff Dwelling, from AD 1300 – Tonto National Monument. It is likely that the lantern slide image (above) is reversed, left-to-right. A few other views from different photographers are shown below for review: "Tonto Cliff Dwellings (Inverted)" – For Comparison "Cliff Dwellings"           by Stewart D Anderson "Tonto National Monument"     by Josh Adams "Lower Ruins V"             by Steve Kleinheider

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content:
Pixel Wrangler-

As usual, you've done some great research for us.  The tough part about lantern slides is that both sides show a clear image, and sometimes it becomes pretty hard to determine which side is which.  I'll go ahead and rectify the situation.  Once again, thank you!
